caption: Relating to the creation of a commission to review and make recommendations regarding certain penal laws of this state and to certain criminal offenses previously compiled in statutes outside the Penal Code; increasing criminal penalties; imposing a civil penalty.
summary: This bill creates a commission to review Texas penal laws (except Penal Code, drug laws, and motor vehicle laws) and make recommendations for repeal or amendment by Nov 2026. The commission will have 9 members appointed by state leaders. The bill also moves sedition and sabotage laws from Government Code to Penal Code. No direct impact on Chinese immigrants, though sedition/sabotage laws could theoretically affect any person regardless of nationality.
translation: 该法案设立一个委员会,负责审查德克萨斯州刑事法律(不包括刑法典、毒品法和机动车法),并在2026年11月前提出废除或修改建议。委员会将由州领导人任命9名成员。该法案还将叛乱和破坏活动相关法律从政府法典移至刑法典。对中国移民没有直接影响,但叛乱/破坏活动法律理论上可能影响任何人,不分国籍。
committees:
1. Criminal Justice Committee
2. State Affairs Committee
3. Judiciary Committee
